name: Slow and Steady
description: Speed is never reduced by armor or encumbrance.

name: Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

name: Defensive Training
description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

name: Greed
description: +2 bonus on Appraise skill checks made to determine the price of nonmagical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.

name: Hatred
description: +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes.

name: Hardy
description: +2 bonus on saving throws against poison, spells, and spell-like abilities.

name: Stability
description: +4 bonus to Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

name: Stonecunning
description: +2 bonus on Perception checks to potentially notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors located in stone walls or floors. You recieve a check to notice these features whenever you pass within 10 feet of them, whether or not you are actively looking.

name: Weapon Familiarity
description: Dwarves are proficient with the battleaxe, heavy pick, and warhammer, and treat any weapon with the word 'dwarven' in its name as a martial weapon.

name: Low-Light Vision
description: Can see twice as far as a human in dim light.

name: Elven Immunities
description: Immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

name: Elven Magic
description: +2 bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. +2 bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify the properties of magic items.

name: Keen Senses
description: +2 bonus on Perception skill checks.

name: Weapon Familiarity
description: Elves are proficient with the longbow, composite longbow, longsword, rapier, shortbow, and composite shortbow, and treat any weapon with the word 'elven' in its name as a martial weapon.

name: Low-Light Vision
description: Can see twice as far as a human in dim light.

name: Defensive Training
description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

name: Gnome Magic
description: Gnomes add +1 to the DC of any saving throws against illusion spells that they cast. Gnomes with charisma 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day-'dancing lights', 'ghost sound', 'prestidigitation', and 'speak with animals'. The caster level for these effects is equal to the gnome's level. The DC for these spells is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the gnome's charisma modifier.

name: Hatred
description: +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes.

name: Illusion Resistance
description: +2 saving throw against illusion spells and effects.

name: Keen Senses
description: +2 bonus on Perception skill checks.

name: Obsessive
description: +2 bonus on a Craft or Profession skill of your choice.

name: Weapon Familiarity
description: Gnomes treat any weapon with the word 'gnome' in its name as a martial weapon.

name: Low-Light Vision
description: Can see twice as far as a human in dim light.

name: Adaptability
description: Receive skill focus as a bonus feat at 1st level

name: Elf Blood
description: Half-elves count as both elves and humans for any effect related to race.

name: Elven Immunities
description: Immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

name: Keen Senses
description: +2 bonus on Perception skill checks.

name: Multitalented
description: Choose two favored classes at 1st level and gain +1 hit point or +1 skill point whenever you take a level in either of those classes.

name: Darkvision
description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

name: Intimidating
description: +2 bonus on Intimidate skill checks.

name: Orc Blood
description: Half-orcs count as both orcs and humans for any effect related to race.

name: Orc Ferocity
description: Once per day, when brought below 0 hit points but not killed, you may fight on for one more round as if disabled. At the end of your next turn, unless brought above 0 hit points, you immediately fall unconscious and begin dying.

name: Weapon Familiarity
description: Half-orcs are proficient with the greataxe and falchion and treat any weapon with the word 'orc' in its name as a martial weapon.

name: Fearless
description: +2 bonus on all saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Halfing Luck.

name: Halfling Luck
description: +1 bonus on all saving throws.

name: Keen Senses
description: +2 bonus on Perception skill checks.

name: Sure-Footed
description: +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb skill checks.

name: Weapon Familiarity
description: Halflings are proficient with the sling and treat any weapon with the word 'halfling' in its name as a martial weapon.

name: Bonus Feat
description: Select one extra feat at 1st level.

name: Skilled
description: Gain an additional skill rank at 1st level and one additional rank whenever you gain a level.
